name: Explorer (aelez)
description:
This game was made by Adam Lederman for the IB MYP project @ BCC. This is a  5-10 minute videogame experience in which  it attempts to make the player feel a specific  emotion. If more than 50% of players feel this emotion while playing, then the project is a success! Please fill out the google form linked below to participate!

https://forms.gle/rDCgxfzAPzA9FK3p9
^^Form can only open in an MCPS account^^

ALL ISSUES IN THE BROWSER VERSION ARE SOLVED BY DOWNLOADING

How to download:

-download the game for your platform from one of the links below

-unzip the file onto your computer

-open the application file (ignore the .pck file, but don't delete it)
